presentation.description: The McAfee Cloud-based Security APS package provides robust integration into the Parallels Automation cloud services system, allowing Service Providers a seamless way to order and automatically provision a broad range of cloud-based security products from McAfee. Specifically, the products Parallels Automation customers can subscribe to include SaaS Email Protection, SaaS Web Protection, SaaS Email Archiving, SaaS Endpoint Protection. Additionally, McAfee SaaS Service Suites are available in bundles of two or more products for easy ordering with additional price discounts.

O pacote McAfee Cloud-based Security APS fornece uma integração robusta com o sistema de serviços em nuvem Parallels Automation, permitindo que os provedores de serviço comprem de modo contínuo e forneçam automaticamente uma ampla gama de produtos de segurança baseados em nuvem da McAfee. Os clientes dos produtos Parallels Automation podem, especificamente, fazer a assinatura para incluir o SaaS Email Protection, SaaS Web Protection, SaaS Email Archiving, e o SaaS Endpoint Protection. Além disso, os McAfee SaaS Service Suites estão disponíveis em grupos de dois ou mais produtos para facilitar a compra com descontos adicionais no preço.

El paquete McAfee Cloud-based Security APS ofrece una sólida integración con el sistema de servicios en la nube Parallels Automation, lo que ofrece a los proveedores de servicios un modo excepcional de solicitar y aprovisionar automáticamente una amplia gama de productos de seguridad basada en la nube de McAfee. En concreto, los productos a los que se pueden suscribir los clientes de Parallels Automation incluyen SaaS Email Protection, SaaS Web Protection, SaaS Email Archiving y SaaS Endpoint Protection. Además, hay suites de McAfee SaaS Service disponibles en paquetes de dos o más productos que pueden solicitarse fácilmente con descuentos de precios adicionales.

The McAfee Cloud-based Security APS package provides robust integration into the Parallels Automation cloud services system, allowing Service Providers a seamless way to order and automatically provision a broad range of cloud-based security products from McAfee. Specifically, the products Parallels Automation customers can subscribe to include SaaS Email Protection, SaaS Web Protection, SaaS Email Archiving, SaaS Endpoint Protection. Additionally, McAfee SaaS Service Suites are available in bundles of two or more products for easy ordering with additional price discounts.

version.entry: Initial package
Fixed a bug when checking if the customer already exists in McAfee and no customers are returned
Removed a workaround which was created to work around the restriction that a Service Provider customer could not be created on McAfee with no products.
Changed the formatting for the package description and summary
Implement the ability to limit the number of Service Users that can be provisioned based on the number of products which have been ordered.
When provisioning, customers containing the McAfee Partner Administrator API User are not linked to each other
Handle Service User Disable and Enable requests from POA
Changed the Endpoint password to be an optional field. If not entered then customers will need to sign into the SecurityCenter to complete the setup
Added an additional entry point to the package to link to the SecurityCenter
Implement the ability to specify a downstream partners reseller ID when the customer is provisioning
Introduced 2 new products (Web/Email/Archiving 1 year and Email/Archiving 1 year)
Ability to enable/disable customers subscription. This will change the customers subscribed products to disrupt their service.
Implemented an internationalization framework to support localization
Fixed a bug where Service Users were not being created if the domain provisioned contained uppercase characters
Created the ability for Service Providers to specify whether domains should be mandatory for customers ordering Email/Web/Archiving products
Fixed an issue when provisioning and a partner has an inactive customer beneath them
Adding unique codes to each error message
Localized for Spanish and Brazilian Portuguese
Automatically setting the MX records on Parallels and Inbound IP on McAfee for each provisioned domain if configured to do so
Adding password validation surrounding the SecurityCenter Password
Fixed a bug where the state was not accepting abbreviations
Adding support for Windows platform which will use a PEM file on the server instead of building one on the fly
Fixed a region issue when full text vs abbreviation passed
Fixed an issue one of the providers was encountering when a customer admin already existed. Now if the account already exists it will not throw an error but instead proceed.
Added a new hidden setting which contains the version and release number. Makes for easier debugging on failed tasks in the task manager
Catching a possible error where no customer detail is returned prior to issuing an update API request

One partner is receiving errors when creating an end-user that I suspect is because the Update is issued immediately after the Create. The fix was to not throw an error into the task manager when this request is sent after the Create
Added the requesting function call into the Soap class error message. The same partner is having issues where the customer ID is empty within whatever API request is being sent in
Fixed an issue when attempting to pull the customer domains within McAfee that was not collecting the customer ID correctly from the environment variables
API request and response logging
Add CloudSSO as a new product to order
Updated the resource descriptions to describe each product better
Updated the CCP UI
Created the capability to support multiple subscriptions for the same customer
Added a verification check to ensure the SecurityCenter email address is provided when ordering an Endpoint product. Presenting the error on the UI in the CCP.
Updated the reference to the deployment pdf
Fixed an issue when an end-user already exists within McAfee
Added the ability for Service Users to specify their allow/deny lists
Added the ability for Service Users to specify their email aliases
Added conditional logic to the CCP UI to show/hide fields based on products being purchased
Re-worked some UI strings according to the new UI
Created a new field on the CCP UI when ordering Endpoint Protection to have the customers re-enter the SecurityCenter Email to confirm that they have entered it correctly
Added conditional logic to the CCP UI to only show the McAfee Control Console/SecurityCenter based on products being purchased
Fixed an issue when requesting to decrease seats of an add-on and the product being removed instead of decreased
Added validation to the SC Password field to prevent /* and */
Fixed an error related to domains not being available when customer updates their application settings
Removed the SSL certificate requirement
1.12 release
SecurityCenter fields are now read-only once they have been provided for Endpoint Protection subscriptions. They may only be modified in the SecurityCenter.
Resolved an issue with managed versus unmanaged customers when using a multi-subscription model
Removal of Cloud SSO product

resource.name: SaaS Email Protection & Continuity
SaaS Email Protection & Continuity
SaaS Email Protection & Continuity
SaaS Email Protection & Continuity
resource.description: McAfee's cloud-based SaaS Email Protection blocks over 99% of spam, fraudulent messages and malware before they enter your network, in addition to enforcing policy based controls on outgoing mail. In case of planned or unplanned outage, SaaS Email Continuity enables web-based email access, management and use, keeping businesses running when their email server is not.

O SaaS Email Protection baseado em nuvem da McAfee bloqueia cerca de 99% de spam, mensagens fraudulentas e malware antes que entrem em sua rede, além de impor a política com base em controles no e-mail enviado. Em caso de interrupção planejada ou não, o SaaS Email Continuity permite o acesso, gerenciamento e uso de e-mail com base na web, mantendo os negócios funcionando mesmo quando seu servidor de e-mail não está.

La función SaaS Email Protection basada en la nube de McAfee bloquea más del 99 % del spam, los mensajes fraudulentos y el malware antes de que entren en su red, además de ejercer controles basados en directivas sobre el correo saliente. En caso de una caída de red (planeada o no), SaaS Email Continuity activa el acceso, la gestión y el uso del correo electrónico basados en Internet, lo que permite a las empresas seguir funcionando cuando no disponen de su servidor de correo electrónico.

McAfee's cloud-based SaaS Email Protection blocks over 99% of spam, fraudulent messages and malware before they enter your network, in addition to enforcing policy based controls on outgoing mail. In case of planned or unplanned outage, SaaS Email Continuity enables web-based email access, management and use, keeping businesses running when their email server is not.

resource.name: SaaS Email Inbound Filtering
SaaS Email Inbound Filtering
SaaS Email Inbound Filtering
SaaS Email Inbound Filtering
resource.description: McAfee's cloud-based SaaS Email Inbound Filtering blocks over 99% of spam, fraudulent messages and malware before they enter your network.
O SaaS Email Inbound Filtering baseado em nuvem da McAfee bloqueia cerca de 99% de spam, mensagens fraudulentas e malware antes que entrem em sua rede.
McAfee SaaS Email Inbound Filtering basado en la nube bloquea más del 99 % del spam, los mensajes fraudulentos y el malware antes de que entren en su red.
McAfee's cloud-based SaaS Email Inbound Filtering blocks over 99% of spam, fraudulent messages and malware before they enter your network.

resource.name: SaaS Email 14 day Quarantine
E-mail do SaaS - 14 dias de quarentena
Cuarentena de 14 días de SaaS Email
SaaS Email 14 day Quarantine
resource.description: McAfee 14 Day Quarantine extends the retention period for messages processed by the email security service by an additional 7 days, for those that require additional days of quarantine storage.

Os 14 dias de quarentena estendida do McAfee estendem o período de retenção de mensagens processadas pelo serviço de segurança de e-mail por um período adicional de sete dias, para aqueles que necessitam de dias adicionais de armazenamento em quarentena.

La cuarentena de 14 días de McAfee amplía el período de conservación de los mensajes procesados por el servicio de seguridad del correo electrónico 7 días más para aquellos que requieren días adicionales de almacenamiento de cuarentena.
McAfee 14 Day Quarantine extends the retention period for messages processed by the email security service by an additional 7 days, for those that require additional days of quarantine storage.

resource.name: SaaS Web Protection
SaaS Web Protection
SaaS Web Protection
SaaS Web Protection
resource.description: McAfee SaaS Web Protection protects businesses against web-borne threats through a reliable security-as-a-service deployment model. Web traffic is simply routed to our load-balanced data centers, where it is scanned with state-of-the-art security technologies to provide comprehensive policy-based protection and web usage control, at near-zero latency.

O McAfee SaaS Web Protection protege os negócios contra ameaças transmitidas pela web por meio de um modelo de distribuição confiável de segurança como serviço (security-as-a-service). O tráfego da Web é simplesmente roteado para nossos data centers com balanceamento de carga, onde é verificado com as mais avançadas tecnologias de segurança para oferecer proteção baseada em política e controle de uso da web abrangentes, com latência próxima a zero.

McAfee SaaS Web Protection protege a las empresas frente a amenazas web con un fiable modelo de despliegue de Security-as-a-Service. Simplemente, el tráfico web se dirige a nuestros centros de datos con equilibrio de carga, donde se analizan con tecnologías de seguridad vanguardistas para proporcionar una protección exhaustiva basada en directivas y un control de uso de Internet con una latencia casi inexistente.

McAfee SaaS Web Protection protects businesses against web-borne threats through a reliable security-as-a-service deployment model. Web traffic is simply routed to our load-balanced data centers, where it is scanned with state-of-the-art security technologies to provide comprehensive policy-based protection and web usage control, at near-zero latency.

resource.description: Customers of McAfee SaaS Email Archiving can turn to McAfee for storage of their historical message data, a feature available in 25 GB increments. Specify the 25 GB increment you would like (enter 1 for 25 GB, 2 for 50 GB, etc.)

SaaS Email Encryption
resource.description: SaaS Email Encryption is an add-on service and complements McAfee SaaS Email Protection with enterprise-level performance going beyond push/pull encryption by helping with the critical task of being able to identify sensitive information and prevent data loss.

O SaaS Email Encryption é um serviço complementar que completa o McAfee SaaS Email Protection com desempenho em nível de empresa e vai além da criptografia push/pull ao ajudar com a tarefa crítica de identificar informações confidenciais e evitar perda de dados.

SaaS Email Encryption es un servicio que complementa a McAfee SaaS Email Protection con un rendimiento a nivel empresarial que va más allá del cifrado de inserción/extracción y que sirve de gran ayuda para la difícil tarea de identificar información confidencial y evitar la fuga de datos.

SaaS Email Encryption is an add-on service and complements McAfee SaaS Email Protection with enterprise-level performance going beyond push/pull encryption by helping with the critical task of being able to identify sensitive information and prevent data loss.

resource.name: SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving Suite - 1-Year Retention
SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving Suite - 1 ano de retenção
SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving Suite: 1 año de retención
SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving Suite - 1-Year Retention
resource.description: McAfee SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving is a comprehensive suite that protects your business from spam, viruses, worms, email attacks, fraud, and spyware, while enabling you to store and retrieve all inbound, outbound, and internal emails efficiently. In addition to McAfee SaaS Email Protection and Continuity, this service suite includes McAfee SaaS Web Protection and McAfee SaaS Email Archiving service with one year of data retention.

O McAfee SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving é um pacote abrangente que protege os seus negócios contra spam, vírus, worms, ataques por e-mail, fraudes e spyware, permitindo-lhe armazenar e recuperar todos os e-mails recebidos, enviados e internos de forma eficiente. Além de McAfee SaaS Email Protection and Continuity, este pacote de serviços inclui o McAfee SaaS Web Protection e o serviço McAfee SaaS Email Archiving com um ano de retenção de dados.

McAfee SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving es una completa suite que protege a su negocio de spam, virus, gusanos, ataques por correo electrónico, fraude y spyware, a la vez que le permite almacenar y recuperar con eficacia todos los correos electrónicos entrantes, salientes e internos. Además de McAfee SaaS Email Protection and Continuity, este conjunto de aplicaciones de servicio incluye McAfee SaaS Web Protection y McAfee SaaS Email Archiving con un año de conservación de datos.

McAfee SaaS Web & Email Security with Archiving is a comprehensive suite that protects your business from spam, viruses, worms, email attacks, fraud, and spyware, while enabling you to store and retrieve all inbound, outbound, and internal emails efficiently. In addition to McAfee SaaS Email Protection and Continuity, this service suite includes McAfee SaaS Web Protection and McAfee SaaS Email Archiving service with one year of data retention.

resource.description: McAfee SaaS Endpoint & Email Protection suite provides anti-virus, anti-spyware and desktop firewall, plus website blocking and content filtering and email security service with additional protection for your email server.

O pacote McAfee SaaS Endpoint & Email Protection oferece antivírus, antispyware e firewall de desktop, além de bloqueio da web, filtragem de conteúdo e serviço de segurança de e-mail, com proteção adicional para o seu servidor de e-mail.

McAfee SaaS Endpoint & Email Protection Suite proporciona antivirus, antispyware y firewall personal, además de bloqueo de sitios web, filtrado de contenido y un servicio de seguridad del correo electrónico con protección adicional para su servidor de correo electrónico.

McAfee SaaS Endpoint & Email Protection suite provides anti-virus, anti-spyware and desktop firewall, plus website blocking and content filtering and email security service with additional protection for your email server.

presentation.name: Service User for McAfee
Usuário do serviço para McAfee
Usuario de servicio de McAfee
Service User for McAfee
presentation.summary: Service users provisioning from Parallels into McAfee are required to go to the McAfee Control Console and complete the "Forgot your password or need to create a password?" step to finish their setup

Os usuários do serviço McAfee que estão configurados na Parallels e que possuem acesso ao Control Console devem solicitar sua senha diretamente no portal através da opção "Esqueceu sua senha ou precisa criar uma senha?" e concluir a configuração.

Los usuarios de servicio que aprovisionan desde Parallels a McAfee deben dirigirse a McAfee Control Console y completar el paso "¿Ha olvidado su contraseña o necesita crear una?" para finalizar la instalación
Service users provisioning from Parallels into McAfee are required to go to the McAfee Control Console and complete the "Forgot your password or need to create a password?" step to finish their setup

setting.name: Service User ID
setting.description: This field will be populated as Service Users are provisioned. Leave as 0 for now.

setting.name: McAfee Control Console User
Usuário do McAfee Control Console
Usuario de McAfee Control Console
McAfee Control Console User
setting.description: The email from this account will be carried over into McAfee as an end-user. The user must proceed through the "Forgot your password or need to create a password" functionality to complete the setup of their account within McAfee in order to gain access to the Control Console.

O e-mail desta conta será transferido para a McAfee como um usuário final. O usuário deve prosseguir com a funcionalidade "Esqueceu sua senha ou precisa criar uma senha" para concluir a configuração de sua conta na McAfee a fim de obter acesso ao Control Console.

El correo electrónico de esta cuenta se transmitirá a McAfee como un usuario final. El usuario debe continuar con la funcionalidad "¿Ha olvidado su contraseña o necesita crear una?" para completar la configuración de su cuenta en McAfee y obtener acceso a Control Console.

The email from this account will be carried over into McAfee as an end-user. The user must proceed through the "Forgot your password or need to create a password" functionality to complete the setup of their account within McAfee in order to gain access to the Control Console.

setting.name: User Alias Address(es)
Endereço(s) de alias de usuário
Direcciones de alias de usuario
User Alias Address(es)
setting.description: If you choose to manage user aliases within this section, do not make modifications to the user aliases within the McAfee Control Console
Se você optar por gerenciar aliases de usuários nesta seção, não faça modificações aos aliases de usuários no McAfee Control Console
Si elige gestionar alias de usuario en esta sección, no haga modificaciones a alias de usuario en McAfee Control Console
If you choose to manage user aliases within this section, do not make modifications to the user aliases within the McAfee Control Console

setting.name: Add senders to the Allowed Senders list
Adicionar remetentes à lista de Remetentes permitidos
Agregar remitentes a la lista de remitentes permitidos
Add senders to the Allowed Senders list
setting.description: You can define lists of senders whose email addresses are always accepted without spam filtering. If you choose to manage allowed senders within this section, do not make modifications to allowed senders within the McAfee Control Console

É possível definir listas de remetentes cujos endereços de e-mail sempre serão aceitos sem filtragem de spam. Se você optar por gerenciar remetentes permitidos nesta seção, não faça modificações aos remetentes permitidos no McAfee Control Console

Puede definir listas de remitentes cuyas direcciones de correo electrónico se acepten siempre sin el filtrado de spam. Si elige gestionar remitentes permitidos en esta sección, no haga modificaciones a remitentes permitidos en McAfee Control Console

You can define lists of senders whose email addresses are always accepted without spam filtering. If you choose to manage allowed senders within this section, do not make modifications to allowed senders within the McAfee Control Console

setting.name: Add senders to the Blocked Senders list
Adicionar remetentes à lista de Remetentes bloqueados
Agregar remitentes a la lista de remitentes bloqueados
Add senders to the Blocked Senders list
setting.description: You can define lists of senders whose email addresses will never be accepted for delivery. If you choose to manage blocked senders within this section, do not make modifications to blocked senders within the McAfee Control Console

É possível definir listas de remetentes cujos endereços de e-mail nunca serão aceitos para entrega. Se você optar por gerenciar remetentes bloqueados nesta seção, não faça modificações aos remetentes bloqueados no McAfee Control Console

Puede definir listas de remitentes cuyas direcciones de correo electrónico no se aceptarán nunca para su entrega. Si elige gestionar remitentes bloqueados en esta sección, no haga modificaciones a remitentes bloqueados en McAfee Control Console

You can define lists of senders whose email addresses will never be accepted for delivery. If you choose to manage blocked senders within this section, do not make modifications to blocked senders within the McAfee Control Console
